title: Emerald and Diamond Cascading Haaram - Pachi Pannala Haaram
materials: 18K Rose Gold (Guvva Bangaram) with Hyderabadi Polish
Natural Emeralds (Pachi Pannalu) of VVS clarity
and brilliant-cut diamonds (Vajralu) of IF clarity
features: This stunning Haaram features three cascading rows of meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds. The focal point is the gracefully designed emerald pendants, each framed by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The setting style ensures maximum brilliance and light dispersion. The design blends the traditional Haaram style with a contemporary aesthetic.
occasions: and formal events. A modern heirloom suitable for both traditional Telugu and contemporary attire.
description: Crafted with the highest quality materials and exceptional Hyderabadi craftsmanship, this Haaram exudes elegance and sophistication. The natural emeralds symbolize growth and prosperity, making it a meaningful and timeless investment. The design blends seamlessly with both traditional and modern styles, ensuring versatility and lasting appeal.
